layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x42
  RenderBlock {html} at (0,0) size 800x42
    RenderBody {body} at (8,8) size 784x26
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x26 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 782x24
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x20
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 388x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (180,2) size 206x16
                text run at (180,2) width 206: "Cell text should be right aligned"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (392,2) size 388x20 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              RenderText {#text} at (180,2) size 206x16
                text run at (180,2) width 206: "Cell text should be right aligned"
